name: They mostly come at night...mostly
description:
Death has marked your time as up and will be sending his minions to kill you. You must build defenses to protect your town hall for as long as possible.

Build during the day to prepare for the attacks at night.

Press Q and E to rotate the camera, click on the build menu to select items to build and then click on the grid.

When ready for night click on the Night button.

**NOTE: There is a bug if you fully surround the turrets or base with fences the enemy AI will not be able to path find**
